about_the_game:
About game


Welcome to the extraordinary and magical island of your dreams!
If you have always wanted to reach the island where the secret desires of every man come true, then this is the very island where it is possible!
On the island, you will meet 8 lovely and different girls. Each of them has its own individual character and unique skills.
You will have an exciting journey, interesting dialogues, and true love. But there is one condition - your character must die.
The island has one unspoken rule: play with one hand!

Gameplay

I`m Isekai Hero is a match3 game with magical obstacles that make the game a bit more challenging. To complete the game, you need to disassemble the previously prepared game level piece by piece. On the island you will meet 8 cute girls, each of whom complicates the game with their magical abilities.

Peculiarities




  • 8 girls with unique characteristics, parameters, and skills. Conquer each of them, conquer the whole magical island!



  • 8 animated sex scenes with unique voice acting, and exceptional sex positions will make you go crazy with their variety!



  • 8 fully animated and voiced BDSM scenes, about 12 toys for a girl, and 8 exclusive opportunities to satisfy a girl. You can set up a process yourself where you and your beloved will get maximum pleasure!



  • Each girl has 5 outfits for her hero to choose from, so you can dress your girlfriend in a classic suit, a swimsuit, a housewife outfit, a kimono, or a naked one.



  • The system of dialogues with girls consists of more than 1000 lines, which makes it possible for you to learn more about the girl, her habits, favorite food, and sex toys.


  • 24 various-complexity levels with match3 mechanism. Every girl has 3 unique levels and a special skill to spice the game up.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity, Sexual Content, General Mature Content, BDSM scenes. All characters are over the age of 20.

name: Isekai Hero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2600K 3.40GHz or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K 4.20 GHz or Ryzen 5 360
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to the extraordinary and magical island of your dreams! If you have always wanted to reach the island where the secret desires of every man come true, then this is the very island where it is possible!
supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
